name: iamproperty & iamsold
description: The Senior Software Engineer at iamproperty is responsible for leading the design, development, and implementation of complex web-based applications, working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions; the role also includes mentoring less experienced software engineers, code review, and contributing to organizational policies for software engineering, and requires a minimum of 5 years of PHP development experience and a strong understanding of PHP frameworks and related technologies.
